scripts.check: yarn lint:ts && yarn fix:js && yarn test:unit
scripts.lint:ts: yarn workspace @transloadit/node lint:ts && yarn workspace @transloadit/types lint:ts && yarn workspace @transloadit/zod lint:ts
scripts.test:unit: yarn workspace @transloadit/node test:unit && yarn workspace @transloadit/types test:unit && yarn workspace @transloadit/zod test:unit
